name: Blackjack 21 Live Casino
description:
The best single-player, realistic Blackjack 21! Play free with unlimited chips!  Play the popular Casino game on your mobile device without the need of an internet connection!

Sharpen your skills in Black Jack and enjoy countless hours of fun with unlimited chips!

BlackJack Unlimited is a single-player, offline game that will make you feel like playing in Las Vegas. There’s no need to rush – play at your own pace!

- Leaderboard – compete with players around the world!
- Achievements – test your skills and get the badges!
- Two seats to play two hands at a time
- Authentic Blackjack rules
- Beautiful graphics

This product is intended for an adult audience (21+) and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
